Articles.Content:
Hi, 

Just started to play kerbal and getting the hang of things. Also been looking into mods and want to know what the essential mods are?

 

Also what mods will i need to recreate iss and build and launch it into orbit?

Hello dannywaugh1 and welcome to the forum!

Opinions on which mods are essential vary wildly.  For me, the most valuable mods are Kerbal Alarm Clock and Kerbal Engineer Redux.  There are threads around which ask people their opinions on top ten mods or which mods are essential.  Try to search for one of those and take a look at it.

Good recreations of the ISS have been done completely stock, if I'm not mistaken.

Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Edited April 6, 2016 by Starhawk

4 minutes ago, Starhawk said:

Hello dannywaugh1 and welcome to the forum!

Opinions on which mods are essential vary wildly.  For me, the most valuable mods are Kerbal Alarm Clock and Kerbal Engineer Redux.  There are threads around which ask people there opinions on top ten mods or which mods are essential.  Try to search for one of those and take a look at it.

Good recreations of the ISS have been done completely stock, if I'm not mistaken.

Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

could  you link me to those mods?

Here are links to their respective forum threads.  The first post in each should have a download link.

Kerbal Alarm Clock    Kerbal Engineer Redux

Happy landings!
